name: aisbreaker-api-js
description: This package contains AIsBreaker pure JS API which provides an easy-to-use and service-agnostic API to access different AI services (like OpenAI/ChatGPT API, Open-Assistant API, Google Bart API and many more) in a uniform way. More details: https://aisbreaker.org/

scripts.build: rm -rf ./build && tsc && npm run findCircularDepsQuick && chmod a+x build/start*.js
scripts.startChat: date --iso-8601=seconds && npm run build && date --iso-8601=seconds && node build/startChat.js
scripts.startImage: date --iso-8601=seconds && npm run build && date --iso-8601=seconds && node build/startImage.js
scripts.startTest: date --iso-8601=seconds && npm run build && date --iso-8601=seconds && node build/startTest.js
scripts.findCircularDeps: npx madge --circular --extensions ts src/ && npx madge --circular --extensions ts .
scripts.//test: # execute unit tests only (i.e. no integration tests)
scripts.unit-tests: npm run build && npm run unit-tests-without-build

author: aisbreaker
